explains: n. 红番椒；香辣牛肉豆子煲

sentences.en: Chile is the world's largest producer of copper.
sentences.cn: 智利是世界上最大的产铜国。

sentences.en: It is a long time since he has visited his native Chile.
sentences.cn: 他很久没有回故乡智利了。

sentences.en: Conservationists in Chile are concerned over the effect of commercial exploitation of forests.
sentences.cn: 智利的自然保护者对森林商业化开发的后果感到担忧。
